snippet: Human Rights Watch is releasing a report on “widespread and systematic” killings of protesters.
abstract: Human Rights Watch issues report implicating senior Egyptian officials, including Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, in what organization calls 'widespread and systematic' killings of protesters; report is issued day after Egypt bars representatives from organization from entering country.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch is releasing a report on “widespread and systematic” killings of protesters.

headline.main: ‘Systematic’ Killings in Egypt Are Tied to Leader, Group Says
headline.print_headline: ‘Systematic’ Killings in Egypt Are Tied to Leader, Group Says

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
